about_the_game:
The official Big Original Soundtrack for Red Planet Rampage (barbeque not included)

Featuring


  • Big music x7
  • Instruments (not up for auction)
  • One (1) sneaky reference to Hackerspace's previous game
  • Light cavalry!?
detailed_description:
The official Big Original Soundtrack for Red Planet Rampage (barbeque not included)

Featuring


  • Big music x7
  • Instruments (not up for auction)
  • One (1) sneaky reference to Hackerspace's previous game
  • Light cavalry!?
legal_notice:
This soundtrack is made by Tore Bergebakken and licensed under Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 4.0 International (CC-BY-SA),
except for Light Cavalry Rag, which is a ragtime arrangement of Light Cavalry Overture by Franz von Suppé (public domain).
name: Big Red Planet Rampage Soundtrack and BBQ

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 100 MB available space
